page.title: 10INDUSTRY IN INKBERROW.
page.content: There are not any factories in Inkberrow,but many of the people make things.Sometimes they make things at home like cards made out of flowers. The flowers are dried and pressed and they have special sticky stuff over the top.Some ladies sew things like tea cosies,aprons and oven gloves and other things for the kitchen.People can go to shops in lots of other places like Stratford-upon-Avon and even London,and buy them.They look like little cottages with material on the roof to look like thatch.They even have flowers round the doors.The name on the bag is THIMBLES of INKBERROW. Some people do out work from factories in Alcester.There is a dairy on the main road.Milk is delivered here from Birmingham and then the family deliver it round Inkberrow and local villages.
